name: Hexvaders
description:
Hexvaders is a game that lets you join the universe of geometry.

- There are 2 game mode:

STORY MODE

In the universe of geometry, Hexagon was always the king of all geometry until the appearance of "Geometrion", an alliance between three factions Triangle, Square and Circle. This alliance gradually took the number one position from Hexagon. Hexagons didn't like this, so they started invading many other planets to grow their force, Hexagon Army. And the preparation was completed. Hexagon Army has arrived at Geometrion and began the invasion.

Triangle (T_046), the only survivor, start his journey to destroy the Hexagon Army and save his planet.

ENDLESS MODE

After the fall of Hexagon Army, Geometrion has a bad time to recovery because they are out of energy and resources. The government setup a team leaded by T_046. His team mission is to explore the universe to find a new resources. Unfortunately, the team fall into the Chaos Zone. Things are not normal here, they have to face many enemies who look like them.

Try your best to survive and hope the rescue team can find you...

- Supported Languages: English, Vietnamese
